text: When someone loves you, the way they talk about you is different. You feel safe and comfortable
author: Jess C. Scott

text: Indifference and neglect often do much more damage than outright dislike
author: J.K. Rowling

text: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed
author: Carl Gustav Jung

text: A guy and a girl can be just friends, but at one point or another, they will fall for each other...Maybe temporarily, maybe at the wrong time, maybe too late, or maybe forever
author: Dave Matthews Band

text: For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home
author: Stephanie Perkins

text: Man may have discovered fire, but women discovered how to play with it
author: Candace Bushnell

text: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much, and forgetting that you are special too
author: Ernest Hemingway

text: I mean, if the relationship can't survive the long term, why on earth would it be worth my time and energy for the short term?
author: Nicholas Sparks

text: When you stop expecting people to be perfect, you can like them for who they are
author: Donald Miller

text: Every man I meet wants to protect me. I can't figure out what from
author: Mae West

text: There is greatness in doing something you hate for the sake of someone you love
author: Shmuley Boteach

text: If conversation was the lyrics, laughter was the music, making time spent together a melody that could be replayed over and over without getting stale
author: Nicholas Sparks

text: I know I am but summer to your heart, and not the full four seasons of the year
author: Edna St

text: Come sleep with me: We won't make Love, Love will make us
author: Julio Cortázar

text: It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party
author: Nick Hornby

text: Holding Eleanor's hand was like holding a butterfly. Or a heartbeat. Like holding something complete, and completely alive
author: Rainbow Rowell

text: To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved anyhow - this is a human offering that can border on miraculous
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

text: Maybe our girlfriends are our soulmates and guys are just people to have fun with
author: Candace Bushnell

text: I’ve been fighting to be who I am all my life. What’s the point of being who I am, if I can’t have the person who was worth all the fighting for?
author: Stephanie Lennox

text: I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me
author: Steve Maraboli

text: Never marry at all, Dorian. Men marry because they are tired, women, because they are curious: both are disappointed
author: Oscar Wilde

text: I suffer from girlnextdooritis where the guy is friends with you and that's it
author: Taylor Swift

text: Man, when you lose your laugh you lose your footing
author: Ken Kesey

text: Every couple needs to argue now and then. Just to prove that the relationship is strong enough to survive. Long-term relationships, the ones that matter, are all about weathering the peaks and the valleys
author: Nicholas Sparks

text: I know enough to know that no woman should ever marry a man who hated his mother
author: Martha Gellhorn

text: For there to be betrayal, there would have to have been trust first
author: Suzanne Collins

text: When you don't talk, there's a lot of stuff that ends up not getting said
author: Catherine Gilbert Murdock

text: Our wounds are often the openings into the best and most beautiful part of us
author: David Richo

text: Cheating and lying aren't struggles, they're reasons to break up
author: Patti Callahan Henry

text: If you spend your time hoping someone will suffer the consequences for what they did to your heart, then you're allowing them to hurt you a second time in your mind
author: Shannon L. Alder

text: I used to advertise my loyalty and I don't believe there is a single person I loved that I didn't eventually betray
author: Albert Camus

text: Relationships dont always make sense. Especially from the outside
author: Sarah Dessen

text: Every couple has ups and downs, every couple argues, and that’s the thing—you’re a couple, and couples can’t function without trust
author: Nicholas Sparks

text: A dame that knows the ropes isn't likely to get tied up
author: Mae West

text: I know my heart will never be the same But I'm telling myself I'll be okay
author: Sara Evans

text: Women cannot complain about men anymore until they start getting better taste in them
author: Bill Maher

text: What we wait around a lifetime for with one person, we can find in a moment with someone else
author: Stephanie Klein

text: I think you are wrong to want a heart. It makes most people unhappy. If you only knew it, you are in luck not to have a heart
author: L. Frank Baum

text: nothing in this world was more difficult than love
author: Gabriel García Márquez

text: Books are a poor substitute for female companionship, but they are easier to find
author: Patrick Rothfuss

text: Every woman that finally figured out her worth, has picked up her suitcases of pride and boarded a flight to freedom, which landed in the valley of change
author: Shannon L. Alder

text: Don't leave a piece of jewelry at his house so you can go back and get it later; he may be with his real girlfriend
author: Amy Sedaris

text: Seldom, very seldom, does complete truth belong to any human disclosure; seldom can it happen that something is not a little disguised or a little mistaken
author: Jane Austen

text: There comes a time in your life when you have to choose to turn the page, write another book or simply close it
author: Shannon L. Alder

text: I find the best way to love someone is not to change them, but instead, help them reveal the greatest version of themselves
author: Steve Maraboli

text: You’re just another story I can’t tell anymore
author: Unknown

text: A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement
author: Jess C Scott

text: Moving on is easy. It's staying moved on that's trickier
author: Katerina Stoykova Klemer

text: Sometimes it takes a heartbreak to shake us awake & help us see we are worth so much more than we're settling for
author: Mandy Hale

text: How would your life be different if…You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day…You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same
author: Steve Maraboli

text: We have to recognise that there cannot be relationships unless there is commitment, unless there is loyalty, unless there is love, patience, persistence
author: Cornel West

text: Assumptions are the termites of relationships
author: Henry Winkler

text: When we face pain in relationships our first response is often to sever bonds rather than to maintain commitment
author: bell hooks

text: You couldn't just pick and choose at will when someone depended on you, or loved you. It wasn't like a light switch, easy to turn on or off. If you were in, you were in. Out, you were out
author: Sarah Dessen

text: I felt like an animal, and animals don’t know sin, do they?
author: Jess C. Scott

text: If you need something from somebody always give that person a way to hand it to you
author: Sue Monk Kidd

text: You can measure the happiness of a marriage by the number of scars that each partner carries on their tongues, earned from years of biting back angry words
author: Elizabeth Gilbert

text: Mocking a woman is like drinking too much wine. It may be fun for a short time, but the hangover is hell
author: Brandon Sanderson

text: When dealing with people, remember you are not dealing with creatures of logic, but with creatures bristling with prejudice and motivated by pride and vanity
author: Dale Carnegie

text: This is what happened in love. One of you cried a lot and then both of you grew sarcastic
author: Lorrie Moore

text: When you loved someone and had to let them go, there will always be that small part of yourself that whispers, What was it that you wanted and why didn't you fight for it?
author: Shannon L. Alder

text: Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means
author: Henny Youngman

text: Most everything you think you know about me is nothing more than memories
author: Haruki Murakami

text: When you hold a grudge, you want someone else’s sorrow to reflect your level of hurt but the two rarely meet
author: Steve Maraboli

text: I define connection as the energy that exists between people when they feel seen, heard, and valued; when they can give and receive without judgment; and when they derive sustenance and strength from the relationship
author: Brené Brown

text: It's probably a bad indicator of your lifestyle when you miss your ex-boyfriend because he's absolutely lethal
author: Charlaine Harris

text: People die, I think, but your relationship with them doesn't. It continues and is ever-changing
author: Jandy Nelson

text: The best relationships in our lives are the best not because they have been the happiest ones, they are that way because they have stayed strong through the most tormentful of storms
author: Pandora Poikilos

text: A true gentleman is one that apologizes anyways, even though he has not offended a lady intentionally. He is in a class all of his own because he knows the value of a woman's heart
author: Shannon Alder

text: Statistically speaking, there is a 65 percent chance that the love of your life is having an affair. Be very suspicious
author: Scott Dikkers

text: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection
author: Bernard Branson

text: Failed relationships can be described as so much wasted make-up
author: Marian Keyes

text: When you struggle with your partner, you are struggling with yourself. Every fault you see in them touches a denied weakness in yourself
author: Deepak Chopra

text: I want to be around people that do things. I don’t want to be around people anymore that judge or talk about what people do. I want to be around people that dream and support and do things
author: Amy Poehler

text: Six hundred and forty fish later, the only thing I know is everything you love will die. The first time you meet someone special, you can count on them one day being dead and in the ground
author: Chuck Palahniuk

text: Can officially confirm that the way to a man's heart these days is not through beauty, food, sex, or alluringness of character, but merely the ability to seem not very interested in him
author: Helen Fielding

text: Love doesn't mean anything if you're not willing to make a commitment, and you have to think not only about what you want, but about what he wants. Not just now, but in the future
author: Nicholas Sparks

text: You like every one; that is to say, you are indifferent to every one
author: Oscar Wilde

text: He loved her for almost everything she was & she decided that was enough to let him stay for a very long time
author: Brian Andreas

text: A busy, vibrant, goal-oriented woman is so much more attractive than a woman who waits around for a man to validate her existence
author: Mandy Hale

text: Unrequited love is the infinite curse of a lonely heart
author: Christina Westover

text: Lonely people tend, rather, to be lonely because they decline to bear the psychic costs of being around other humans. They are allergic to people. People affect them too strongly
author: David Foster Wallace

text: I have no right to say or do anything that diminishes a man in his own eyes. What matters is not what I think of him but what he thinks of himself. Hurting a man in his dignity is a crime
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

text: When what you hear and what you see don't match, trust your eyes
author: Dale Renton

text: We ruined each other by being together. We destroyed each other’s dreams
author: Kate Chisman

text: We all take different paths in life, but no matter where we go, we take a little of each other everyhwere
author: Tim McGraw

text: Hope for love, pray for love, wish for love, dream for love…but don’t put your life on hold waiting for love
author: Mandy Hale

text: If you're trapped in the dream of the Other, you're fucked
author: Gilles Deleuze

text: When God knows you're ready for the responsibility of commitment, He'll reveal the right person under the right circumstances
author: Joshua Harris

text: Don't worry about hurting me, if that's what you're afraid of. I want to get hurt. At least I´ll feel something for a change
author: Katie Kacvinsky

text: We are not written for one instrument alone; I am not, neither are you
author: André Aciman

text: One of the best times for figuring out who you are & what you really want out of life? Right after a break-up
author: Mandy Hale

text: Intimacy is the capacity to be rather weird with someone - and finding that that's ok with them
author: Alain de Botton

text: Trust is the glue of life. It's the most essential ingredient in effective communication. It's the foundational principle that holds all relationships
author: Stephen R. Covey

text: Sometimes I get real lonely sleeping with you
author: Haruki Murakami

text: Trust is the fruit of a relationship in which you know you are loved
author: William P. Young

text: You know someone's right for you when the things they don't have to say are even more important than the things they do
author: Jodi Picoult

text: The words ‘I Love You’ kill, and resurrect millions, in less than a second
author: Aberjhani

text: My girlfriend is sad and quiet and keeps me up all night worrying about her
author: Rainbow Rowell

text: I got my heart's desire, and there my troubles began
author: Lev Grossman

text: You Can't Lose Something You Never Had
author: Kate G. Hudson

text: My head’ll explode if I continue with this escapism
author: Jess C Scott

text: I just...I just miss him. And I hate being so alone
author: Suzanne Collins

text: That night when you kissed me, I left a poem in your mouth, and you can hear some of the lines every time you breathe out
author: Andrea Gibson

text: If equal affection cannot be, Let the more loving one be me
author: W.H. Auden

text: Submission is not about authority and it is not obedience; it is all about relationships of love and respect
author: Wm. Paul Young

text: Wanting him to come back before anyone notices part of the world has not moved since he left
author: Brian Andreas

text: Most men claim to desire driven, independent and confident women. Yet when confronted with such a creature reverence often evolves into resent. For just like women, men need to be needed
author: Tiffany Madison

text: That's the power of literature, you know, it can act like little love letters between two people who can only explain their feelings by pointing at other people's
author: Fredrik Backman

text: It’s hard to communicate anything exactly and that’s why perfect relationships between people are difficult to find
author: Gustave Flaubert

text: It's not your job to like me - it's mine
author: Byron Katie

text: We know from daily life that we exist for other people first of all, for whose smiles and well-being our own happiness depends
author: Albert Einstein

text: Have you ever noticed how parents can go from the most wonderful people in the world to totally embarrassing in three seconds?
author: Rick Riordan

text: How could I be sleeping with this particular man.... Surely only true love could justify my lack of taste
author: Margaret Atwood

text: I'm not crying because of you; you're not worth it. I'm crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are
author: Steve Maraboli

text: And now you are and I am and we're a mystery which will never happen again
author: E.E. Cummings

text: Because isn’t that the point of every relationship: to be known by someone else, to be understood? He gets me. She gets me. Isn’t that the simple magic phrase?
author: Gillian Flynn

text: You know that when I hate you, it is because I love you to a point of passion that unhinges my soul
author: Julie de Lespinasse

text: I suppose that since most of our hurts come through relationships so will our healing, and I know that grace rarely makes sense for those looking in from the outside
author: Wm. Paul Young

text: Physical love is unthinkable without violence
author: Milan Kundera

text: I believe in love the verb, not the noun
author: Greg Behrendt

text: Learn to deal with the fact that you are not a perfect person but you are a person that deserves respect and honesty
author: Pandora Poikilos

text: A man is lucky if he is the first love of a woman. A woman is lucky if she is the last love of a man
author: Charles Dickens

text: Love cannot live where there is no trust
author: Edith Hamilton

text: Yes, it's a well-known fact about you: you're like death, you take everything
author: Milan Kundera

text: I believe in the immeasurable power of love; that true love can endure any circumstance and reach across any distance
author: Steve Maraboli

text: There isn't time, so brief is life, for bickerings, apologies, heartburnings, callings to account. There is only time for loving, and but an instant, so to speak, for that
author: Mark Twain

text: It's just the most amazing thing to love a dog, isn't it? It makes our relationships with people seem as boring as a bowl of oatmeal
author: John Grogan

text: But why, why, why can't people just say what they mean?
author: Graeme Simsion

text: The quickest way to rectify that mistake (choosing the wrong person) is by learning from that, moving on, and choosing much more wisely in the future
author: Greg Behrendt

text: What you want most you push away from you. You want more than you care to admit
author: Tarjei Vesaas

text: Love without sacrifice is like theft
author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

text: Some people come into our lives and leave footprints on our hearts and we are never ever the same
author: Flavia Weedn

text: Right now we are here, and nothing can mar our perfection, or steal the joy of this perfect moment
author: Audrey Niffenegger

text: Making love to me is amazing. Wait, I meant: making love, to me, is amazing. The absence of two little commas nearly transformed me into a sex god
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

text: If you spend your life sparing people’s feelings and feeding their vanity, you get so you can’t distinguish what should be respected in them
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

text: Death is the easy part, the hard part is living and knowing you could be so much more then you’re willing to be
author: Robert m drake

text: If a man can possess a woman sexually -really possess- he won't need to control her ideas, her opinions, her clothes, her friends, even her other lovers
author: Toni Bentley

text: Siblings: children of the same parents, each of whom is perfectly normal until they get together
author: Sam Levenson

text: Caring about someone isn't complicated. It isn't easy. But it isn't complicated, either. Kinda like lifting the engine block out of a car
author: Jim Butcher

text: Why don’t we break up? I guess I stay with her because she stays with me. And that’s not an easy thing to do
author: John Green

text: We met each other when we were young, before we knew enough about disappointment, and once we did we found we reminded each other of it
author: Nicole Krauss

text: She preferred imaginary heroes to real ones, because when tired of them, the former could be shut up in the tin kitchen till called for, and the latter were less manageable
author: Louisa May Alcott

text: Don't let a thief into your house three times. The first time was enough. The second time was a chance. The third time means you're stupid
author: C. JoyBell C

text: I make love with a focus and intensity that most people reserve for sleep
author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo

text: My love is pizza shaped. Won’t you have a slice? It’s circular, so there’s enough to go around
author: Dora J. Arod

text: Being single doesn't mean you're weak, it means that you're strong enough to wait for the right person
author: Niall Horan

text: But it is impossible to go through life without trust; that is to be imprisoned in the worst cell of all, oneself
author: Graham Greene

text: Everything you want in life is a relationship away
author: Idowu Koyenikan

text: Love lasts about seven years. That's how long it takes for the cells of the body to totally replace themselves
author: Francois Sagan
